channel.title: Yet another question :P
channel.description: Is it allowed to edit someone else's client in order to make it for your server, so you can release an "official" client for your server, and of course give the original designers of the client around 99% credits, and like 1% to yourself for the edit. I'm finally starting to get into servers more, and I want to stay on the good side of everybody. :P

item.title: Yet another question :P
item.dc:creator: @tuptup13 tuptup13
item.description:
@tuptup13 wrote:

Yeah someone got on my source and kept spamming saying leeched and shit like that… he kept coming back and i did give 99.9% to coder… I edited half the items though for their bonuses.

Read full topic

item.title: Yet another question :P
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

just dont realease to public or they call you a leecher for only changing name

Read full topic
